title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 17.10 - Supervision
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 17.10 - Supervision

State Regulations

It shall be the responsibility of the operator of the mobile home park to see that all facilities are kept in good working order and in good repair. This includes water supply facilities, sewage treatment and disposal facilities, grounds, roadways, and any other facility, appliances, or equipment pertinent to the normal operation of the mobile home park. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
